entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 6:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 96 %

Wind: N 1 km/h

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023
